article.title: ICx Technologies Awarded Contract for Future Nuclear, Biological and Chemical Reconnaissance System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ICx Technologies Incorporated has been awarded a $20.7 million, cost-plus-fixed-fee-price contract for systems engineering, analysis and integration of the Joint Nuclear Biological Chemical Reconnaissance System Increment 2. U.S. Army Research, Development and Engineering Command Acquisition Center, Aberdeen, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
